## IContainer.updateInputForChild() method

Changes the input for a given child. Note, this will override any inherited state taken from the container itself.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
updateInputForChild<EEI extends EmbeddableInput>(id: string, changes: Partial<EEI>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | <code>string</code> |  |
|  changes | <code>Partial&lt;EEI&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
